parameters.name: DtsInstanceId
parameters.description: Migration, synchronization, or subscription instance ID.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: Data migration or synchronization instance ID, which can be queried by calling the **describedtsjobs** interface.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: Region ID. Pass this parameter to specify the region where the instance is located. For more details, see the list of supported regions.

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
Synchronization direction, values: - **Forward**: Forward. - **Reverse**: Reverse.
> - The default value is **Forward**. - **Reverse** can only be passed when the topology of the data synchronization instance is bidirectional, to release the reverse synchronization link.
